articles.author: Cara Tabachnick
articles.title: Colombia police arrest 73-year-old American for giving "cannabis tours" in his home - CBS News
articles.description: An American living in Colombia distributed flyers and advertised on social media for tourists to attend a "cannabis tour."
articles.content:
In a new type of "travel high," an American was arrested on Tuesday by Colombian police for allegedly offering $30 "cannabis tours" to tourists in his home. 
The 73-year-old man advertised on social… [+1691 chars]

articles.title: Worrying figures show STD rates skyrocket among Americans 55 and older - Irish Star
articles.description: STDs are infecting older Americans at 'a shocking rate'
articles.content:
STD rates are seemingly 'skyrocketing' among older Americans according to the most recent figures released by the Centers for Disease Control (CDC).
